name: Barbarian
description: A fierce warrior who can enter a battle rage, granting them superhuman strength and resilience.

name: Bard
description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

name: Cleric
description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

name: Druid
description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

name: Fighter
description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

name: Monk
description: A master of unarmed combat, using their ki energy to enhance their abilities.

name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior who fights in the name of their deity.

name: Ranger
description: A skilled hunter and tracker, who can fight with both ranged and melee weapons.

name: Rogue
description: A master of stealth and deception, who is skilled in the use of daggers, bows, and other finesse weapons.

name: Sorcerer
description: A natural-born spellcaster who has an innate connection to magic.

name: Warlock
description: A spellcaster who has made a pact with a powerful otherworldly being.

name: Wizard
description: A master of arcane magic, who has studied long and hard to learn the secrets of the universe.
